narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility manager.
The facility is applying for a C license to exhibit farm animals to the public.  To obtain a license, the licensing fee
must be sent to:
USDA, APHIS, AC
920 Main Campus
Suite 200
Raleigh, NC  27606
NO REGULATED ACTIVITIES MAY BE CONDUCTED UNTIL A VALID USDA LICENSE IS OBTAINED.

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
